data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As the Earth spins, it appears to us that the celestial sphere is spinning. It ____ about ____ Earth's ____, ____ that ____ celestial ____ appear ____ and ____ stars ____ planets ____ to ____ in ____ around ____ poles. Stars move at 15° an hour.
data.partBlankContent: As the Earth spins, it appears to us that the celestial sphere is spinning. It sp___ about t__ Earth's po__, s_ that t__ celestial po___ appear stati_____ and t__ stars a__ planets se__ to mo__ in cir____ around t__ poles. Stars move at 15° an hour.
data.fullContent: As the Earth spins, it appears to us that the celestial sphere is spinning. It spins about the Earth's pole, so that the celestial poles appear stationary and the stars and planets seem to move in circles around the poles. Stars move at 15° an hour.
data.answer: 当地球自转的时候，在我们看来天球也在自转。它绕着地球的极点旋转，所以天极看起来是静止的，而恒星和行星似乎是绕着地极绕圈运动。恒星每小时移动15度。
